addr: 700 S Grand Ave Los Angeles, CA 90017
title: Downtown LA Housing Bus Tour - Free
desc: Living in Downtown LA is hotter than ever! ?If you are considering a move to Downtown, then let us help you find the perfect place to call home in one of Downtown's 75 apartment, condominium, and loft properties. ?This half day tour introduces you to neighborhoods throughout Downtown and goes inside a variety of available rental properties and condominiums for sale. ?We will also provide an introduction to Downtown's many neighborhoods, pointing out Downtown icons such as L.A. LIVE, the Walt Disney Concert Hall, and the Cathedral of our Lady of the Angels. Please note that featured projects change for each tour, and we will be visiting sales centers and/or model units for apartments and condominiums under construction. Once you're done with the tour, don't forget to continue exploring Downtown's restaurants, museums, shopping and much more! Park at the Athena lot on Grand Avenue between 7th and 8th. ?Rate is $5/day with our $1 off coupon that we provide. The Housing Tour group meets inside Bottega Louie at 8:45am. ?Check in with one of our Purple Ambassadors. ? Make sure to wear comfortable shoes and feel free to bring a snack and bottled water. ? Please register separately for each tour attendee.
